messages.id: Internal state transition error
messages.message: Internal state transition error
messages.translation: Er is een fout opgetreden in de interne staat

messages.id: The client registered with an invalid client ID: '{Name}'
messages.message: The client registered with an invalid client ID: '{Name}'
messages.translation: De client heeft zich geregistreerd met een onjuiste identiteit: '{Name}'

messages.id: The client registered with an invalid version: '{Version}'
messages.message: The client registered with an invalid version: '{Version}'
messages.translation: De client heeft zich geregistreerd met een onjuiste versie: '{Version}'

messages.id: The log file with directory: '{Directory}' failed to initialize
messages.message: The log file with directory: '{Directory}' failed to initialize
messages.translation: Het log bestand met pad: '{Directory}' kon niet aangemaakt worden

messages.id: Client has an invalid state
messages.message: Client has an invalid state
messages.translation: De client heeft een onjuiste staat

messages.id: Server/organization discovery with Let's Connect is not supported
messages.message: Server/organization discovery with Let's Connect is not supported
messages.translation: Servers of organisaties verkrijgen met de Let's Connect client wordt niet ondersteund

messages.id: An error occurred after getting the discovery files for the list of organizations
messages.message: An error occurred after getting the discovery files for the list of organizations
messages.translation: Er is een fout opgetreden met het ophalen van de lijst van organisaties

messages.id: An error occurred after getting the discovery files for the list of servers
messages.message: An error occurred after getting the discovery files for the list of servers
messages.translation: Er is een fout opgetreden met het ophalen van de lijst van servers

messages.id: The current server could not be found when getting it for expiry
messages.message: The current server could not be found when getting it for expiry
messages.translation: De huidige VPN server kon niet worden gevonden voor expiratie

messages.id: The client tried to autoconnect to the VPN server: {Namesrv}, but no secure internet location is found. Please manually connect again
messages.message: The client tried to autoconnect to the VPN server: {Namesrv}, but no secure internet location is found. Please manually connect again

messages.id: The secure internet location could not be set
messages.message: The secure internet location could not be set
messages.translation: De locatie voor de "secure internet" server kon niet worden gezet

messages.id: The client tried to autoconnect to the VPN server: {Namesrv}, but you need to authorizate again. Please manually connect again
messages.message: The client tried to autoconnect to the VPN server: {Namesrv}, but you need to authorizate again. Please manually connect again

messages.id: The authorization procedure failed to complete
messages.message: The authorization procedure failed to complete
messages.translation: Het authorizatie proces kon niet vervuld worden

messages.id: The client tried to autoconnect to the VPN server: {Namesrv}, but no valid profiles were found. Please manually connect again
messages.message: The client tried to autoconnect to the VPN server: {Namesrv}, but no valid profiles were found. Please manually connect again

messages.id: No suitable profiles could be found
messages.message: No suitable profiles could be found
messages.translation: Er zijn geen profielen gevonden om mee te verbinden

messages.id: Profile with ID: '{PID}' could not be set
messages.message: Profile with ID: '{PID}' could not be set
messages.translation: Het profiel met identiteit: '{PID}' kon niet gezet worden

messages.id: Profile with ID: '{PID}' could not be obtained from the server
messages.message: Profile with ID: '{PID}' could not be obtained from the server
messages.translation: Het profiel met identiteit: '{PID}' kon niet opgehaald worden van de server

messages.id: The identifier that was passed to the library is incorrect
messages.message: The identifier that was passed to the library is incorrect
messages.translation: De identieit die aan de library werd gegeven is niet correct

messages.id: Could not retrieve institute access server with URL: '{Identifier}' from discovery
messages.message: Could not retrieve institute access server with URL: '{Identifier}' from discovery
messages.translation: De institute access server met URL: '{Identifier}' kon niet opgehaald worden van discovery

messages.id: The institute access server with URL: '{Identifier}' could not be added
messages.message: The institute access server with URL: '{Identifier}' could not be added
messages.translation: De institute access server met URL: '{Identifier}' kon niet toegevoegd worden

messages.id: The secure internet server with organisation ID: '{Identifier}' could not be retrieved from discovery
messages.message: The secure internet server with organisation ID: '{Identifier}' could not be retrieved from discovery
messages.translation: De secure internet server met identiteit: '{Identifier}' kon niet opgehaald worden van discovery

messages.id: The secure internet server with organisation ID: '{Identifier}' could not be added
messages.message: The secure internet server with organisation ID: '{Identifier}' could not be added
messages.translation: De secure internet server met identiteit: '{Identifier}' kon niet toegevoegd worden

messages.id: The custom server with URL: '{Identifier}' could not be added
messages.message: The custom server with URL: '{Identifier}' could not be added
messages.translation: De server met URL: '{Identifier}' kon niet toegevoegd worden

messages.id: Server type: '{Type}' is not valid to be added
messages.message: Server type: '{Type}' is not valid to be added
messages.translation: Het server type: '{Type}' kan niet toegevoegd worden

messages.id: The VPN configuration could not be obtained
messages.message: The VPN configuration could not be obtained
messages.translation: De VPN configuratie kon niet opgehaald worden

messages.id: The current profile could not be found
messages.message: The current profile could not be found
messages.translation: Het huidig profiel kan niet gevonden worden

messages.id: Not a valid server type: {Type}
messages.message: Not a valid server type: {Type}
messages.translation: {Type} is niet een geldig server type

messages.id: Identifier: '{Identifier}' for server with type: '{Type}' is not valid
messages.message: Identifier: '{Identifier}' for server with type: '{Type}' is not valid
messages.translation: De identiteit: '{Identifier}' voor server met type: '{Type}' is niet geldig

messages.id: The operation for getting a VPN configuration was canceled
messages.message: The operation for getting a VPN configuration was canceled
messages.translation: De procedure om een VPN configuratie op te halen is geannuleerd

messages.id: Failed to set the server with identifier: '{Identifier}' as the current
messages.message: Failed to set the server with identifier: '{Identifier}' as the current
messages.translation: De server met identiteit: '{Identifier}' kon niet als de hudige server gezet worden

messages.id: Identifier: '{Identifier}' for server with type: '{Type}' is not valid for removal
messages.message: Identifier: '{Identifier}' for server with type: '{Type}' is not valid for removal
messages.translation: Identiteit: '{Identifier}' voor server met type: '{Type}' is niet geldig om verwijderd te worden

messages.id: Failed to get the current server to cleanup the connection
messages.message: Failed to get the current server to cleanup the connection
messages.translation: De huidige server kon niet opgehaald worden om de connectie te verwijderen

messages.id: Failed to cleanup the VPN connection for the current server
messages.message: Failed to cleanup the VPN connection for the current server
messages.translation: De VPN connectie is niet volledig opgeruimd

messages.id: Setting a secure internet location with Let's Connect! is not supported
messages.message: Setting a secure internet location with Let's Connect! is not supported
messages.translation: Er kan geen locatie ingesteld worden met de Let's Connect! client

messages.id: No secure internet server available to set a location for
messages.message: No secure internet server available to set a location for
messages.translation: Er is geen "secure internet" server beschikbaar om de locatie voor in te stellen

messages.id: Failed to get current server for renewing the session
messages.message: Failed to get current server for renewing the session
messages.translation: De huidige server kon niet opgehaald worden om de sessie te hernieuwen

messages.id: Failover failed to complete with gateway: '{Gateway}' and mtu: '{Mtu}'
messages.message: Failover failed to complete with gateway: '{Gateway}' and mtu: '{Mtu}'
messages.translation: Het failovermechanisme kon niet vervuld worden met gateway: '{Gateway}' en MTU: '{Mtu}'

messages.id: Failed internal state transition requested by the client from: '{StateNamecurr}' to '{StateNamestate}'
messages.message: Failed internal state transition requested by the client from: '{StateNamecurr}' to '{StateNamestate}'
messages.translation: De interne staat kon niet bijgewerkt worden van: '{StateNamecurr}' naar '{StateNamestate}'

messages.id: timeout reached
messages.message: timeout reached
messages.translation: Er is een time-out opgetreden in de verbinding. Controleer uw internetverbinding
